spells.name: Call Lightning
spells.description: Calls down lightning bolts (3d6 per bolt) from sky.

spells.name: Diminish Plants
spells.description: Reduces size or blights the growth of normal plants.

spells.name: Dominate Animal
spells.description: One animal obeys your silent mental commands and orders.

spells.name: Meld into Stone
spells.description: You and your gear merge with stone.

spells.name: Neutralize Poison
spells.description: Immunizes subject against poison, detoxifies venom in or on subject.

spells.name: Poison
spells.description: Touch deals 1d3 Con damage 1/round for 6 rounds.

spells.name: Protection from Energy
spells.description: Absorbs 12 points/level of damage from one kind of energy.

spells.name: Speak with Plants
spells.description: You can talk to plants and plant creatures.

spells.name: Spike Growth
spells.description: Creatures in area take 1d4 damage, may be slowed.

spells.name: Wind Wall
spells.description: Deflects arrows, smaller creatures, and gases.
